# NSPopUpButton.ArrowPosition

**Enumeration**

These constants are defined for use with the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSPopUpButtonCell/arrowPosition] property.

## Declaration

```swift
enum ArrowPosition
```

## Constants

- **NSPopUpButton.ArrowPosition.noArrow**: Does not display any arrow in the control.
- **NSPopUpButton.ArrowPosition.arrowAtCenter**: Arrow is centered vertically, pointing toward the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSPopUpButtonCell/preferredEdge].
- **NSPopUpButton.ArrowPosition.arrowAtBottom**: Arrow is drawn at the edge of the button, pointing toward the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSPopUpButtonCell/preferredEdge].

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
